text: Arrentela is a former civil parish in the municipality (concelho) of Seixal, Lisbon metropolitan area, Portugal. In 2013, the parish merged into the new parish Seixal, Arrentela e Aldeia de Paio Pires. The population in 2011 was 28,886,Instituto Nacional de Estatística in an area of 10.17 km².Eurostat It is situated on the south side of the estuary of the river Tagus. ==Localities== The freguesia of Arrentela included the following localities: *Casal do Marco *Casal de Santo António *Cavadas *Cavaquinhas *Pinhal dos Frades *Torre da Marinha ==Places of interest== *Moinho do Breyner ==Sporting club== *Atletico Clube de Arrentela ==References== ==External links== * Official page of the parish of Arrentela Category:Former parishes of Portugal Category:Parishes of Seixal
title: Arrentela
